title: Judith Edelman Band Live
teaser: She's been called edgy, funky, darkly brilliant, fully literate, and shockingly good. During the 90s, her band toured all over the world, setting venues ablaze with their unforgettable originals and musical virtuosity. The Judith Edelman band plays live in this special 1998 performance, recorded for the Breakdown.
